feed.title: Homepage Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.11
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: correct caculations for mailcow widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4055
  • Fix: lubelogger vehicleID not working with labels by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4066
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint from 8.57.0 to 8.57.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4074
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump postcss from 8.4.45 to 8.4.47 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4073
  • Chore(deps): Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.8 to 1.15.9 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4075
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.5.4 to 5.6.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4076
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react from 7.36.1 to 7.37.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4077
  • Fix: wg-easy disabled field not visible by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4096
  • Enhancement: handle immich v1.118 breaking API change by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4110
  • Fix: add noreferrer to bookmark links by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4112
  • Feature: Vikunja service widget by @vhsdream in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4118
  • Enhancement: support netalertX token for password-protected instances by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4122

New Contributors

  • @vhsdream made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4118

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.10...v0.9.11

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.12
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Enhancement: npm widget support ≥ v2.12 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4140
  • Chore: filter Radarr movie response by @markp-mckinney in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4199
  • Fix: pyload widget - encode proxy params by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4210
  • Fix: use same unit default for openmeteo widget and api by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4227
  • Enhancement: use duration for audiobookshelf total, refactor uptime by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4229
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump tailwindcss from 3.4.13 to 3.4.14 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4232
  • Chore(deps): Bump urbackup-server-api from 0.52.0 to 0.52.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4233
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump typescript from 5.6.2 to 5.6.3 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4234
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-import from 2.30.0 to 2.31.0 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4236
  • Feature: Headscale Service Widget by @erelender in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4247
  • Enhancement: quicklaunch fill search suggestion on arrowright by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4256
  • Feature: Beszel service widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4251

New Contributors

  • @markp-mckinney made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4199
  • @erelender made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4247

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.11...v0.9.12

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.9.13
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: Prometheus Metric service widget by @fcornelius in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4269
  • Fix: use session_key instead of Id in tautulli component to resolve unique key warning by @Johnomated in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4278
  • Feature: suwayomi Service Widget by @Robonau in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4273
  • Enhancement: allow widgets to specify default headers, fix buffer error output by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4287
  • Feature: Add ArgoCD widget by @fcornelius in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4305
  • Feature: Spoolman Widget by @fgeck in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3959
  • Feature: gitlab service widget by @UrsKroell in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4317

New Contributors

  • @fcornelius made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4269
  • @Johnomated made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4278
  • @Robonau made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4273
  • @fgeck made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/3959
  • @UrsKroell made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4317

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.12...v0.9.13

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Feature: nested groups by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4346
  • Enhancement: multiple widgets per service https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/commit/907abee1aa87c696872eeda68efb58a278c9846a
  • Enhancement: Add hrefs to info widgets by @DamitusThyYeetus123 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4347
  • Enhancement: set css color-scheme by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4349
  • Chore: move custom css loading, add letter-spacing by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4359
  • Enhancement: glances containers metric widget by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4361
  • Chore(deps): Bump gamedig from 5.1.3 to 5.1.4 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4369
  • Chore(deps-dev): Bump eslint-plugin-react from 7.37.1 to 7.37.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4367
  • Enhancement: icons-only bookmarks style by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4384
  • Fix: correct evcc units by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4396
  • Enhancement: downloading torrents list for qbittorrent by @Mindfreak9100 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4405
  • Fix: glances metric - different key for process list memory on window… by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4410
  • Enhancement: better display of finnhub tickers with exchange by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4425
  • Enhancement: add basic auth to ESPHome widget by @jesserockz in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4429
  • Enhancement: downloading torrents list for deluge by @Mindfreak9100 in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4436
  • Enhancement: beszel widget compatibility with v0.9.0 by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4439

New Contributors

  • @DamitusThyYeetus123 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4347
  • @Mindfreak9100 made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4405
  • @jesserockz made their first contribution in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4429

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.9.13...v0.10.0

entry.title: New release for Homepage: v0.10.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fix: fix search overlay behind status indicators in 0.10.x by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4484
  • Fix: fun with padding and margins by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4489
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4481
  • Tweak: remove extra padding for nested groups by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4474
  • Tweak: again trying to restore chart sizing in 0.10.x by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4479
  • New Crowdin translations by GitHub Action by @github-actions in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4470
  • Fix: metric heights in 0.10.x by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4467
  • Chore: warn and dont fail for invalid services by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4468
  • Chore(deps): Bump systeminformation from 5.23.5 to 5.23.8 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4450
  • Fix: dont discard service groups not included in layout by @shamoon in https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/pull/4456

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gethomepage/homepage/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.4
